category.name: Substance Compliance IMDS Integration
category.category_description: Teamcenter Preferences for Substance Compliance International Material Data System (IMDS) Integration

preference.name: Mat1MaterialRevision_sci0ImdsSupplier_expression
preference.preference_description: Represents the Supplier Information related to International Material Data System (IMDS) material. It combines the values of sci0Supplier (IMDS Material Supplier Information) and sci0SupplierOverflow (IMDS Material Supplier Information Overflow), and provides the complete string.
